A

ALIVE - Game.Model.Enums.GridSquareStatus

B

Loads and launches the Battleship game

Main class for the game Battleship

BoardState - Class in Game.Model
This class tracks the state of a grid for a Battleship player, validates guesses, and also tracks what boats have or can be placed on the board.
BoardState(boolean) - Constructor for class Game.Model.BoardState
Constructs a fresh state of the Battleship game and initializes an empty grid
BoatOrientations - Enum in Game.Model.Enums
Contains possible boat orientations when designing

G

Game - package Game
Contains all packages related to and required to run the Battleship game
GAME_OVER - Game.Model.Enums.GameStatus
Game is in GAME_OVER status and the current game has ended
Game.Controller - package Game.Controller
Controller for the Battleship game.
Game.Model - package Game.Model
These classes contain the game's logic and manage it.
Game.Model.Enums - package Game.Model.Enums
Contains enums for the model
Game.Util - package Game.Util
Contains constants and util methods that are used by other packages
Game.View - package Game.View
These classes create and manage the UI for the Battleship game
GameState - Class in Game.Model
This class represents the current state of the game and tracks turns, score, and current status/phase of the game
GameState() - Constructor for class Game.Model.GameState
Creates a new GameState and randomly picks who go first
